headlines.description: Ross Barkley scored an injury-time equaliser as Chelsea salvaged a 2-2 draw with Manchester United on a dramatic afternoon at Stamford Bridge.
headlines.shortLinkText: Last-gasp Barkley saves Chelsea vs. Man United

headlines.description: Bournemouth were held 0-0 by Southampton in the Premier League, with the stalemate maintaining their unbeaten record at home this season.
headlines.shortLinkText: Southampton hold on to claim vital point at Bournemouth

headlines.description: Promoted Cardiff City celebrated their first Premier League win of the season after coming from behind to beat Fulham 4-2 at home in a rip-roaring c
headlines.shortLinkText: Cardiff beat Fulham for first league win

headlines.description: Champions Manchester City took over sole control at the top of the Premier League table with an easy 5-0 win over Burnley.
headlines.shortLinkText: City go top with 5-0 crushing of Burnley

events.name: Brighton & Hove Albion at Newcastle United

headlines.shortLinkText: Newcastle rue poor finishing in 1-0 loss to Brighton

events.name: Tottenham Hotspur at West Ham United

headlines.description: Tottenham Hotspur secured a hard-fought 1-0 win over lowly London rivals West Ham United thanks to a deft first-half finish from Erik Lamela.
headlines.shortLinkText: Lamela goal edges Spurs to win at West Ham

headlines.description: Two goals in the space of 58 first-half seconds set Watford on the way to a deserved 2-0 victory.
headlines.shortLinkText: Watford's lighting double strike ends Wolves' fine run

headlines.description: Liverpool ground out a 1-0 win at Huddersfield as Mohamed Salah's goal took them back up to second place in the Premier League table.
headlines.shortLinkText: Salah strike enough to earn Liverpool win
